info.name: Reimburse API
info.description:
API documentation for Reimburse Backend Application.

## Base URL
- **Local**: `http://reimburse.localhost:8888/api`

## Authentication
This API uses Laravel Sanctum for authentication. After login/register, you'll receive a Bearer token that must be included in subsequent requests.

### Headers
```
Authorization: Bearer {token}
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
```

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and profile.

request.description:
Register a new user account.

### Request Body
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | string | Yes | User's full name (max 255 chars) |
| email | string | Yes | Unique email address |
| password | string | Yes | Password (min 8 chars) |
| password_confirmation | string | Yes | Must match password |

### Response (201 Created)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Registrasi berhasil",
    "data": {
        "user": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "John Doe",
            "email": "john@example.com"
        },
        "token": "1|abc123..."
    }
}
```

Logout user and revoke current access token.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Logout berhasil"
}
```

item.name: Categories
item.description: Category management endpoints. Categories are predefined expense types.

response.name: Success - 200 OK

item.name: Clients
item.description: Client management endpoints. Clients can be auto-registered from mobile app.

query.description: Optional: Filter clients by name (for autocomplete)

request.description:
Get clients list for autocomplete functionality.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| search | string | No | Filter clients by name (partial match) |

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "PT ABC Indonesia"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "CV XYZ Mandiri"
        }
    ]
}
```

### Notes
- Returns max 20 clients
- Ordered alphabetically by name

Create a new client (auto-register from mobile app).

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Request Body
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | string | Yes | Unique client name (max 255 chars) |

### Response (201 Created)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Client berhasil ditambahkan",
    "data": {
        "id": 3,
        "name": "PT New Client Indonesia",
        "created_by": 1,
        "is_auto_registered": true,
        "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}
```

response.name: Success - 201 Created

item.name: Reimbursements
item.description: Reimbursement CRUD operations and summary statistics.

query.description: Optional: Filter by status (pending, approved, rejected)

request.description:
Get current user's reimbursements with pagination and filters.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| status | string | No | Filter by status: `pending`, `approved`, `rejected` |
| month | integer | No | Filter by month (1-12) |
| year | integer | No | Filter by year (e.g., 2024) |
| page | integer | No | Page number (default: 1) |

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "current_page": 1,
        "data": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "user_id": 1,
                "client_id": 1,
                "category_id": 1,
                "amount": "150000.00",
                "transaction_date": "2024-01-15",
                "note": "Meeting lunch",
                "image_path": "receipts/abc123.jpg",
                "status": "pending",
                "client": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "name": "PT ABC"
                },
                "category": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "name": "Makan",
                    "icon": "utensils"
                }
            }
        ],
        "per_page": 20,
        "total": 45
    }
}
```

formdata.description: Client name (will be created if not exists)

request.description:
Create a new reimbursement entry with receipt image.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Request Body (multipart/form-data)
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| client_name | string | Yes | Client name (max 255 chars, auto-creates if not exists) |
| category_id | integer | Yes | Valid category ID |
| amount | numeric | Yes | Amount in IDR (min 0) |
| transaction_date | date | Yes | Date of transaction (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| note | string | No | Additional note (max 1000 chars) |
| image | file | Yes | Receipt image (max 20MB) |

### Response (201 Created)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Reimbursement berhasil disimpan",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "user_id": 1,
        "client_id": 1,
        "category_id": 1,
        "amount": "150000.00",
        "transaction_date": "2024-01-15",
        "note": "Meeting lunch with client",
        "image_path": "receipts/abc123.jpg",
        "status": "pending",
        "client": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "PT ABC Indonesia"
        },
        "category": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Makan",
            "icon": "utensils"
        }
    }
}
```

response.name: Success - 201 Created

request.description:
Get detailed information about a specific reimbursement.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Path Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | integer | Yes | Reimbursement ID |

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "user_id": 1,
        "client_id": 1,
        "category_id": 1,
        "report_id": null,
        "amount": "150000.00",
        "transaction_date": "2024-01-15",
        "note": "Meeting lunch",
        "image_path": "receipts/abc123.jpg",
        "status": "pending",
        "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
        "client": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "PT ABC"
        },
        "category": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Makan",
            "icon": "utensils"
        },
        "report": null
    }
}
```

### Error (403 Forbidden)
Returned when trying to access another user's reimbursement.
```json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Tidak diizinkan"
}
```

Update a pending reimbursement. Only entries with status 'pending' can be updated.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Path Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | integer | Yes | Reimbursement ID |

### Request Body (multipart/form-data)
All fields are optional - only send fields you want to update:

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| _method | string | Yes | Must be "PUT" for form-data |
| client_name | string | No | New client name |
| category_id | integer | No | New category ID |
| amount | numeric | No | New amount |
| transaction_date | date | No | New transaction date |
| note | string | No | New note (can be null) |
| image | file | No | New receipt image (max 20MB) |

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Reimbursement berhasil diupdate",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "amount": "200000.00",
        "client": {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "PT Updated Client"
        }
    }
}
```

### Error (422 Unprocessable Entity)
Returned when trying to update non-pending reimbursement.
```json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Hanya entry pending yang bisa diubah"
}
```

response.name: Error - 422 Not Pending

request.description:
Get dashboard statistics for current user.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "monthly_total": 1500000.00,
        "monthly_count": 15,
        "pending_count": 5,
        "all_time_total": 25000000.00
    }
}
```

### Response Fields
| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| monthly_total | float | Total reimbursement amount this month |
| monthly_count | integer | Number of reimbursements this month |
| pending_count | integer | Number of pending reimbursements (all time) |
| all_time_total | float | Total reimbursement amount (all time) |

Get all reports for current user.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Response (200 OK)
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "user_id": 1,
            "period_start": "2024-01-01",
            "period_end": "2024-01-31",
            "total_amount": "1500000.00",
            "total_entries": 15,
            "pdf_path": "reports/2024-01_abc123.pdf",
            "status": "generated",
            "created_at": "2024-02-01T10:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-02-01T10:00:00.000000Z"
        }
    ]
}
```

### Notes
- Reports are ordered by period_start descending (newest first)

Download the PDF file for a specific report.

### Authentication
ðŸ”’ Requires Bearer Token

### Path Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | integer | Yes | Report ID |

### Response (200 OK)
Returns PDF file download with filename: `Reimburse_YYYY-MM.pdf`

### Error Responses

#### 403 Forbidden
Returned when trying to access another user's report.
```json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Tidak diizinkan"
}
```

#### 404 Not Found
Returned when PDF file is not available.
```json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "PDF belum tersedia"
}
```
